addon_accessControl.name: Access Control Testing
addon_accessControl.description: Adds a set of tools for testing access control in web applications.
addon_accessControl.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_accessControl.changes:
Added

  • Add API support.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.

addon_alertFilters.name: Alert Filters
addon_alertFilters.description: Allows you to automate the changing of alert risk levels.
addon_alertFilters.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_alertReport.name: Report alert generator
addon_alertReport.description: Allows you to generate reports for alerts you specify in pdf or odt format
addon_alertReport.author: Talsoft SRL
addon_alertReport.changes:
Fix an exception while generating the report (Issue 1612).
Include Alert's evidence in report of ODT format.

addon_allinonenotes.name: All In One Notes
addon_allinonenotes.description: A simple extension to view all notes in one pane.
addon_allinonenotes.author: David Vassallo

addon_ascanrules.name: Active scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.description: The release quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrules.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Terminology

Added

  • The following scan rules were promoted to Beta: ELMAH Information Leak, .htaccess Information Leak (Issue 6211).

addon_ascanrulesAlpha.name: Active scanner rules (alpha)
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.changes:
Changed

  • 'Hidden File Finder' ensure that test requests are appropriately rebuilt for this scan rule (Issue 6129).
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Terminology.
  • SocketTimeoutException in the LDAP Injection scan rule.

Removed

  • The following scan rules were removed and promoted to Beta: Cloud Meta Data, .env File, Hidden Files, XSLT Injection (Issue 6211).

addon_ascanrulesBeta.name: Active scanner rules (beta)
addon_ascanrulesBeta.description: The beta quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesBeta.changes:
Changed

  • XML External Entity Attack scan rule changed to parse response body irrespective of the HTTP response status code. (Issue 6203)
  • XML External Entity Attack scan rule changed to skip only Remote File Inclusion Attack when Callback extension is not available.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • The Relative Path Confusion scan rule no longer treats 'href="#"' as a problematic use.

Fixed

  • Terminology.
  • Correct reason shown when the XML External Entity Attack scan rule is skipped.
  • SocketTimeoutException in the Proxy Disclosure scan rule.

Added

  • The following scan rules were promoted to Beta: Cloud Meta Data, .env File, Hidden Files, XSLT Injection (Issue 6211).

Removed

  • The following scan rules were removed and promoted to Release: ELMAH Information Leak, .htaccess Information Leak (Issue 6211).

addon_attacksurfacedetector.name: Attack Surface Detector
addon_attacksurfacedetector.description: The Attack Surface Detector analyzes web application source code to generate endpoints that can be used for penetration testing.
addon_attacksurfacedetector.author: Secure Decisions (Matthew DeLetto)
addon_attacksurfacedetector.changes:
Various incremental changes (see https://github.com/secdec/attack-surface-detector-zap/releases)
Fix un-handled exception when target unavailable & address various "house keeping" tasks.

addon_authstats.name: Authentication Statistics
addon_authstats.description: Records logged in/out statistics for all contexts in scope.
addon_authstats.author: ZAP Core Team

addon_browserView.name: Browser View
addon_browserView.description: Adds an option to render HTML responses like a browser
addon_browserView.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_browserView.changes: Allow to properly scroll the rendered page.

addon_bruteforce.name: Forced Browse
addon_bruteforce.description: Forced browsing of files and directories using code from the OWASP DirBuster tool
addon_bruteforce.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bruteforce.changes:
Changed

  • Now targets ZAP 2.8.0.
  • Fix un-handled exception when base request doesn't end in a slash (Issue 5435).
  • Split up the functionality from the desktop UI and provide external access (Issue 2848)
  • Updated addon to use log4j instead of stdout (Issue 5530)
  • Log exceptions instead of printing to stderr (Issue 5564).
  • Address UI hang.

Added

  • Table export button.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

addon_callgraph.name: Call Graph
addon_callgraph.description: Allows the user to view a call graph of the selected resources
addon_callgraph.author: Colm O'Flaherty

addon_codedx.name: Code Dx Extension
addon_codedx.description: Includes request and response data in XML reports and provides the ability to upload reports directly to a Code Dx server
addon_codedx.author: Code Dx, Inc.
addon_codedx.changes: • Make fixes to the report generation process to handle encoding the same as other ZAP reports

addon_commonlib.name: Common Library
addon_commonlib.description: A common library, for use by other add-ons.
addon_commonlib.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_commonlib.changes:
Changed

  • AbstractAppFilePlugin > don't raise issues for responses other than 200 - Ok unless at LOW threshold (Issue 6077). This will make the following Alpha and Beta active scan rules slightly less False Positive prone:
    • Trace.axd, .env File, .htaccess file

addon_communityScripts.name: Community Scripts
addon_communityScripts.description: Useful ZAP scripts written by the ZAP community.
addon_communityScripts.author: ZAP Community
addon_communityScripts.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL, shown in the marketplace and Manage Add-ons dialogue.
  • active/cve-2019-5418.js > An active scanner for Ruby on Rails Accept header content disclosure issue.
  • active/JWT None Exploit.js > Checks if the application's JWT implementation allows the usage of the 'none' algorithm.
  • authentication/DjangoAuthentication.js > Django authentication script.
  • authentication/GetsWithRedirectThenPost.js > An authentication script that follows GET redirects and then submits a POST with the authentication credentials.
  • extender/Simple Reverse Proxy.js > Adds a simple reverse proxy.
  • extender/ZAP onEvent Handler.js > An example for how to listen for internal ZAP events.
  • httpsender/add-extra-headers.js > Adds encountered 'extra' headers to all requests.
  • httpsender/aws-signing-for-owasp-zap.py > Signs requests to AWS.
  • httpsender/fingerprinter.js > Logs MD5s of responses.
  • httpsender/greenbone-maintain-auth.js > An auth helper script for OpenVAS Greenbone web interface.
  • httpsender/inject-xss.js > Injects XSS payloads into JSON responses.
  • httpsender/juice-shop-maintain-auth.js > An auth helper script for OWASP JuiceShop.
  • httpsender/keep-cookies-going.js > An auth helper script.
  • httpsender/maintain-jwt.js > Tracks JWTs and updates Authorization bearer headers.
  • passive/Find IBANs.js > Finds IBANs in HTTP response bodies.
  • passive/HUNT.py > Merge of existing HUNT scripts.
  • proxy/Drop requests by response code.js > Drops requests that have a given response code.
  • standalone/scan_rule_list.js > Lists details from both active and passive scan rules.
  • standalone/Split download extract.rb > Concatenates split file downloads.

Changed

  • Change info URL to link to the online help page.
  • Updated to target ZAP 2.9

Removed

  • The following scripts were merged into a new script HUNT.py:
    • passive/HUNT - Debug & Logic Parameters.py
    • passive/HUNT - File Inclusion.py
    • passive/HUNT - IDOR.py
    • passive/HUNT - RCE.py
    • passive/HUNT - SQLi.py
    • passive/HUNT - SSRF.py
    • passive/HUNT - SSTI.py

Fixed

  • Fix links to source files in zaproxy repo.

addon_custompayloads.name: Custom Payloads
addon_custompayloads.description: Ability to add, edit or remove payloads that are used i.e. by active scanners
addon_custompayloads.author: ZAP Core Team

addon_customreport.name: CustomReport
addon_customreport.description: New HTML report module allows users to customize report content.
addon_customreport.author: Chienli Ma
addon_customreport.changes:
• Improve layout/sizing of Generate Report dialogue (Issue 5521).
  • Remove unused library.

addon_diff.name: Diff
addon_diff.description: Displays a dialog showing the differences between 2 requests or responses. It uses diffutils and diff_match_patch
addon_diff.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_directorylistv1.name: Directory List v1.0
addon_directorylistv1.description: List of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv1.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv1.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.5.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_directorylistv2_3.name: Directory List v2.3
addon_directorylistv2_3.description: Lists of directory names to be used with "Forced Browse" add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3.changes:
Removed repeated files.
Added strings for version control directories of Git, Mercurial, SVN, Bazaar.

addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.name: Directory List v2.3 LC
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.description: Lists of lower case directory names to be used with "Forced Browse" add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.changes: Added strings for version control directories of Git, Mercurial, SVN, Bazaar.

addon_domxss.name: DOM XSS Active scanner rule
addon_domxss.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_domxss.changes:
Fixed

  • Use default browser when no browser is specified in the configuration rule.

addon_encoder.name: Encoder
addon_encoder.description: Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processors as well
addon_encoder.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_encoder.changes:
Added

  • rot13.js example script.
  • SHA256 predefined processor.
  • Full URL Encode predefined processor (Issue 6171).

addon_exportreport.name: Export Report
addon_exportreport.description: Report Export module that allows users to customize content and export in a desired format.
addon_exportreport.author: Goran Sarenkapa - JordanGS
addon_exportreport.changes:
• Remove API when uninstalling.
  • Fix exception with Java 9+ (Issue 4214).

addon_formhandler.name: Form Handler
addon_formhandler.description: This Form Handler Add-on allows a user to define field names and values to be used in a form's fields. Fields can be added, modified, enabled, and deleted for use in form fields.
addon_formhandler.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_formhandler.changes: Add context menu to params panel.

addon_fuzz.name: Fuzzer
addon_fuzz.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzz.changes:
Fixed

  • Fix exception when saving the options with no default category selected (Issue 6136).

addon_fuzzdb.name: FuzzDB Files
addon_fuzzdb.description: FuzzDB files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer
addon_fuzzdb.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzzdb.changes:
Removed

  • Removed 'attack' sub-folder and content, all of which is being migrated to the 'FuzzDB Offensive' add-on due to AV triggers (Issue 5972).

addon_fuzzdboffensive.name: FuzzDB Offensive
addon_fuzzdboffensive.description: FuzzDB web backdoors and attack files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer or for manual penetration testing
addon_fuzzdboffensive.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzzdboffensive.changes:
Changed

  • Do not set the background colour of the help page.
  • Migrated 'attack' directory and components from main FuzzDB add-on, due to anti-virus considerations (Issue 5972).
  • Updated from upstream.

addon_gettingStarted.name: Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.description: A short Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_graaljs.name: GraalVM JavaScript
addon_graaljs.description: Provides the GraalVM JavaScript engine for ZAP scripting.
addon_graaljs.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_graphql.name: GraphQL Support
addon_graphql.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_graphql.changes:
Changed

  • Enhanced Support for Script Input Vectors.
  • Options are now exposed through the API.
  • Optional Arguments are enabled by default.

Fixed

  • Fix clashes in variable names. See PR#2550 for details.
  • Fix a bug where the "GraphQL Support.js" script was enabled when ZAP was restarted even if it had been disabled and saved before.
  • Fix a bug where sites tree entries were not showing parameters because of the script.

addon_highlighter.name: Highlighter
addon_highlighter.description: Allows you to highlight strings in the request and response tabs.
addon_highlighter.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_highlighter.changes:
Fix help related exception in the Highlighter panel.
Correct resizing of Highlighter panel.
Update minimum ZAP version to 2.5.0.

addon_hud.description: Display information from ZAP in browser.
addon_hud.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_hud.changes:
Fixed

  • Problems with Firefox 81 due to referer header not being set cross domain. #815

addon_imagelocationscanner.name: Image Location and Privacy Scanner
addon_imagelocationscanner.description: Image Location and Privacy Passive Scanner

addon_imagelocationscanner.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.
  • Updated to Image Location and Privacy Scanner version 1.1; merged from source

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Correct repository URL in about help page.

addon_importLogFiles.name: Log File Importer
addon_importLogFiles.description: Allows you to import log files from ModSecurity and files previously exported from ZAP
addon_importLogFiles.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_importLogFiles.changes: Use API actions when importing files.

addon_importurls.name: Import files containing URLs
addon_importurls.description: Adds an option to import a file of URLs. The file must be plain text with one URL per line.
addon_importurls.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_importurls.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.8.0.
  • Add import menu to (new) top level Import menu instead of Tools menu.

addon_invoke.name: Invoke Applications
addon_invoke.description: Invoke external applications passing context related information such as URLs and parameters
addon_invoke.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_jruby.name: Ruby scripting
addon_jruby.description: Allows Ruby to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jruby.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_jsonview.name: Json view
addon_jsonview.description: Adds a view that shows JSON messages nicely formatted
addon_jsonview.author: Juha Kiveks

addon_jwt.name: JWT Support
addon_jwt.description: Detect JWT requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_jwt.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com
addon_jwt.changes:
• First version of JWT Support.
    • Contains scanning rules for basic JWT related vulnerabilities.
    • Contains JWT Fuzzer for fuzzing the JWT's present in the request.

addon_jython.name: Python Scripting
addon_jython.description: Allows Python to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jython.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_jython.changes:
Correctly set path module defined in the options and address UI hang (Issue 4651).
Minor tweak in extender template.
Add default template for Script Input Vector.
Add help page for the options.

addon_kotlin.name: Kotlin Support
addon_kotlin.description: Allows Kotlin to be used for ZAP scripting
addon_kotlin.author: StackHawk Engineering

addon_neonmarker.name: Neonmarker
addon_neonmarker.description: Colors history table items based on tags
addon_neonmarker.author: Juha Kiveks, Kingthorin
addon_neonmarker.changes:
Fixed

  • Fixed an exception which was occurring when the tab was shown during install.
  • Fixed an exception when ZAP is used in CLI mode.

addon_onlineMenu.name: Online menus
addon_onlineMenu.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_onlineMenu.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Updated to point to the new ZAP website

addon_openapi.name: OpenAPI Support
addon_openapi.author: ZAP Dev Team plus Joanna Bona, Nathalie Bouchahine, Artur Grzesica, Mohammad Kamar, Markus Kiss, Michal Materniak, Marcin Spiewak, and SDA SE Open Industry Solutions
addon_openapi.changes:
Added

  • Map Structure support for OpenAPI v3.0 (Issue 5863).
  • Using OpenAPI Example values for value generation in request bodies and urls (Issue 5168).

Changed

  • Improve content checks when spidering for specifications (Issue 5725).
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Notify all redirects followed for proper passive scanning.

addon_portscan.name: Port Scanner
addon_portscan.description: Allows to port scan a target server
addon_portscan.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_portscan.changes:
Code changes for Java 9 (Issue 2602).
Issue 3513: Options panel UI fixes.

addon_pscanrules.name: Passive scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.description: The release quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrules.changes:
Changed

  • The CSP scan rule now checks if the form-action directive allows wildcards.
  • The CSP scan rule now includes further information in the description of allowed wildcard directives alerts when the impacted directive is one (or more) which doesn't fallback to default-src.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Changed ViewState and XFrameOption rules to return example alerts for the docs.
  • Handle an IllegalArgumentException that could occur in the CSP scan rule if multiple CSP headers were present and one (or more) had a report-uri directive when trying to merge them.
  • Allow to ignore cookies in same site and loosely scoped scan rules.
  • The Application Error scan rule will not alert on web assembly responses.

addon_pscanrulesAlpha.name: Passive scanner rules (alpha)
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_pscanrulesBeta.name: Passive scanner rules (beta)
addon_pscanrulesBeta.description: The beta quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesBeta.changes:
Changed

  • Update RE2/J library to latest version (1.5).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Content Security Policy header missing scan rule changed to Medium risk in order to align with other CSP findings, and confidence to High (Issue 6301).

addon_quickstart.name: Quick Start
addon_quickstart.description: Provides a tab which allows you to quickly test a target application
addon_quickstart.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_quickstart.changes:
Added

  • Warning when HUD is enabled only in scope

addon_replacer.name: Replacer
addon_replacer.description: Easy way to replace strings in requests and responses.
addon_replacer.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_replacer.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.
  • Allow byte replacement using hexadecimal escapes (Issue 5328).

Fixed

  • Fix link in API endpoint description.

addon_requester.name: Requester
addon_requester.author: Surikato
addon_requester.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.
  • Allow to disable cookies (Issue 4934).

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.

Fixed

  • Add the requests to the Sites tree to be able to active scan them (Issue 5778).
  • Enforce the mode when sending the request and following redirections.

addon_retire.name: Retire.js
addon_retire.author: Nikita Mundhada and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_retire.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with upstream retire.js pattern changes.
  • Add-on promoted to Release.
  • Added example alert.

addon_reveal.name: Reveal
addon_reveal.description: Show hidden fields and enable disabled fields
addon_reveal.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_revisit.name: Revisit
addon_revisit.description: Revisit a site at any time in the past using the session history
addon_revisit.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_revisit.changes:
Code changes for Java 9 (Issue 2602).
Updated for 2.7.0.

addon_saml.name: SAML Extension
addon_saml.description: Detect, Show, Edit, Fuzz SAML requests
addon_saml.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_saml.changes:
• Update minimum ZAP version to 2.5.0.
  • Compressed SAMLMessage is not required
  • Possibility to disable compression when sending
  • Added SAML Passive Scanner
  • Dynamically unload the add-on.
  • Fix exception with Java 9+ (Issue 5032).
  • Replaced joda.time.datetime with java.time.localtime (Java8).

addon_saverawmessage.name: Save Raw Message
addon_saverawmessage.description: Allows to save content of HTTP messages as binary
addon_saverawmessage.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_savexmlmessage.name: Save XML Message
addon_savexmlmessage.description: Allows to save content of HTTP messages as XML
addon_savexmlmessage.author: thatsn0tmysite

addon_scripts.name: Script Console
addon_scripts.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_scripts.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.8.0.
  • Update help to mention custom script/global variables (Issue 3402).
  • Move empty template entry to the top, for consistency with other fields in New Script dialogue.
  • Save cursor position when switching between scripts.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

Fixed

  • Fix links in script templates.

addon_selenium.name: Selenium
addon_selenium.description: WebDriver provider and includes HtmlUnit browser
addon_selenium.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_selenium.changes:
Added

  • Support for selenium scripts which are invoked when browsers are launched.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Set Firefox browser.tabs.documentchannel pref to false to fix HUD issue

addon_sequence.name: Sequence
addon_sequence.description: Gives the possibility of defining a sequence of requests to be scanned.
addon_sequence.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_spiderAjax.name: Ajax Spider
addon_spiderAjax.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax
addon_spiderAjax.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_spiderAjax.changes:
Added

  • Allow to specify allowed resources (Issue 3236). The allowed resources are always fetched even if out of scope, allowing to include necessary resources (e.g. scripts) from 3rd-parties. By default it allows files with extension .js and .css.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Unregister the event publisher when the add-on is uninstalled.
  • Persist the state of "Remove Without Confirmation" of non-default elements to click.

addon_sqliplugin.name: Advanced SQLInjection Scanner
addon_sqliplugin.description: An advanced active injection bundle for SQLi (derived by SQLMap)
addon_sqliplugin.author: Andrea Pompili (Yhawke)
addon_sqliplugin.changes:
• Update minimum ZAP version to 2.5.0.
  • Bundle JDOM library instead of relying on core.

addon_sse.name: Server-Sent Events
addon_sse.description: Allows you to view Server-Sent Events (SSE) communication.
addon_sse.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_svndigger.name: SVN Digger files
addon_svndigger.description: SVN Digger files which can be used with ZAP forced browsing
addon_svndigger.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_tips.name: Tips and Tricks
addon_tips.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_tips.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Updated for move from irc.mozilla.org to freenode

Removed

  • Remove tips related to Filter functionality, it no longer exists.

addon_tlsdebug.name: TLS Debug
addon_tlsdebug.description: Provides a tab which allows to quickly debug a TLS/SSL connection
addon_tlsdebug.author: P.M.J. Roth
addon_tlsdebug.changes:
Update minimum ZAP version to 2.5.0.
Change default accelerator for TLS Debug tab.

addon_tokengen.name: Token Generation and Analysis
addon_tokengen.description: Allows you to generate and analyze pseudo random tokens, such as those used for session handling or CSRF protection
addon_tokengen.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_tokengen.changes:
• Maintenance changes.
  • Address problem from v12 where analysis dialog wasn't being shown after collection (this was due to a build issue).

addon_treetools.name: TreeTools
addon_treetools.description: Tools to add functionality to the tree view.
addon_treetools.author: Carl Sampson

addon_viewstate.name: ViewState
addon_viewstate.author: Calum Hutton
addon_viewstate.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.

Fixed

  • Fix memory leak.

addon_wappalyzer.name: Wappalyzer - Technology Detection
addon_wappalyzer.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_wappalyzer.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with upstream Wappalyzer icon and pattern changes.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • When available the description of a given app/technology will show in the tooltip for a row in the table, and be included in detailed API responses.

addon_webdriverlinux.name: Linux WebDrivers
addon_webdriverlinux.description: Linux WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdriverlinux.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_webdrivermacos.name: MacOS WebDrivers
addon_webdrivermacos.description: MacOS WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdrivermacos.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_webdriverwindows.name: Windows WebDrivers
addon_webdriverwindows.description: Windows WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdriverwindows.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_websocket.name: WebSockets
addon_websocket.description: Allows you to inspect WebSocket communication.
addon_websocket.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_websocket.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Allow to use newer versions of Fuzzer add-on.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Correctly handle API request without parameters.
  • Fixed an exception which was occurring when the tab was shown when a handshake response was first encountered during a ZAP session.

addon_zest.name: Zest - Graphical Security Scripting Language
addon_zest.description: A graphical security scripting language, ZAPs macro language on steroids
addon_zest.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_zest.changes:
Added

  • Allow to create a screenshot from the browser, using the context menu Add Zest Client > Screenshot.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.9.0.
  • Update Zest library to 0.15.0:
    • Do not follow redirects when disabled;
    • Reduce the changes done to the requests sent.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Make sure the header fields are separated with CRLF when edited in the UI.
  • Handle client requests when authenticating (Issue 5940).
